title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A no battery
message:
Board will not recognize and charge the battery.
Any suggestion?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A no battery
message: Remove BIL and try again, also measure voltage on SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL and SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA should be about 3.4V

title: [SOLVED]820-2915-A no battery
message: Checked those. Voltage was alternating between 1.8 and 8. So it came to me that the battery might cause it. Tried with another one. And it works. Thanks.
